availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bank established in Louisville, Kentucky, by an act of the General Assembly of Kentucky on February 2, 1833. President(s): Joshua Bethel Bowles.

ab.bibl:
Edwards' Annual Director to the Inhabitants, Institutions, Incorporated Companies, Manufacturing Establishments, Business firms, Etc., Etc., in the City of Louisville, For 1865-6 (Louisville: Edwards, Greenough & Deved, 1866), 219.
Preston S. Loughborough, “An ACT to establish the Louisville Bank of Kentucky,” A Digest of the Statute Laws of Kentucky, of a Public and Permanent Nature, Passed Since 1834, with References to Judicial Decisions (Frankfort, KY: Albert G. Hodges, 1842), 83.
Tanner’s Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 ed. Henry Tanner (Louisville: Directory Publication and Advertising Agency, 1861), 38.
KYR-0001-017-0190.
